title: Icon
body: I gift Xayah maybe 5 dayes ago and i dont get Xayah and Rakan icon how that? o.O I want that icon me and papucica1000 dont get icon and we gift Xayah so when we get icon? o.O

replies.body: The [**event page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions) for those icons mentions that the event lasts from April 19-26. The icons will all be given out over the next 2 weeks following the event.
